feed.title: Dockcheck Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.4.4
entry.content:
Fixes:

  • Bugfix with the new timeout function, which would break on non amd64/arm64.

Great catch and solution by @yoyoma2

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.4.3...v0.4.4

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.4.5
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Added a check for timeout binary, skipping timeouts if not available (core-utils).
  • Reverted to old syntax of array sorting for compatibility with older bash versions.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.4.4...v0.4.5

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.4.6
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Compatibility fixes to timeout function (no --foreground flag if busybox). thanks to @cerealconyogurt who reported and tested.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.4.5...v0.4.6

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.4.7
entry.content:
New:

  • Create notify_gotify.sh by @cerealconyogurt in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/87

Fixes:

  • zero configuration DSM notification emails by @yoyoma2 in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/88
  • smtp-template changes: deprecate ssmtp, suggest msmtp. Background and solution(https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/issues/89) by @ShanDestromp - merged in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/90

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.4.6...v0.4.7

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.4.8
entry.content:
New:

  • Added pre-commit checks by @bocan in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/92

Fixes:

  • Rewrote prune logic to not prompt if -a|-y or -n flags are used. Autoprune with -p flag. https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/commit/7d825f36c9ebcfbcfd01d1b1499276258bf4a969

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.4.7...v0.4.8
